fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: Roll 2d3 dice and choose 2 targets (may be the same person). If the dice roll a 3, that person gains 1 stack of **Suffocated** until they take their next turn due to all that weird unused hairspray I had in my closet.

fields.name: - Flipped (only If <:blue:1106234079055200378> Is A Color On This Card) ( <:purple:1106247148607131711> + <:magenta:1106716255966220319> <:magenta:1106716255966220319> ):
fields.value: Roll 4d5 dice and choose 4 targets (you may choose the same person twice). If the dice roll over a 3, that person gains 1 stack of **Suffocated** until 2 rounds pass. Ugh, my old hairspray was strong...
